body.p: The appearance of selected items in the Table of Contents can be enhanced.

To highlight the background of the selected item, follow these steps:
Locate the toc.css file in the following two directories:
For DITA transformations:
[OXYGEN_DIR]\frameworks\dita\DITA-OT\plugins\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\skins\desktop
[OXYGEN_DIR]\frameworks\dita\DITA-OT\plugins\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\skins\desktop-frames
For DocBook transformations:
[OXYGEN_DIR]\frameworks\docbook\xsl\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\skins\desktop
[OXYGEN_DIR]\frameworks\docbook\xsl\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\skins\desktop-frames
Edit that CSS file, find the menuItemSelected class, and change the value of the background property. Also, you can overwrite the same value from your own CSS.
